meanings.sent1: The antismuggling laws were created to stop illegal activities.
meanings.sent2: She had an antismuggling attitude towards any illegal goods.
meanings.sent3: The antismuggling campaign was so successful that even the smugglers were impressed.
meanings.sent4: His antismuggling stance was as firm as a brick wall.
meanings.sent5: The bright red antismuggling sign caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of preventing or stopping smuggling activities.
meanings.sent1: The government implemented strict antismuggling measures at the border.
meanings.sent2: She joined the antismuggling task force to protect the country's economy.
meanings.sent3: The antismuggling operation turned into a cat-and-mouse game with the smugglers.
meanings.sent4: The antismuggling efforts were like a shield against illegal trade.
meanings.sent5: The captain's dedication to antismuggling was unwavering.
